Name: Ice Cream Killer
About the game: Ice-Cream Killer is an old style platform game that will test your skills. An ice cream man dressed as a penguin who drives a van with a giant penguin-shaped ice cream loses his precious load, help him recover all the penguin-shaped ice creams without getting caught. The costume will prevent the ice cream man from using his hands, but he can use the head or the beak to smash bricks and make his enemies fall. Use your skills to complete this penguin-shaped game XD
